K10sf280_sc:1: Wal_1 dakṣiṇasyāḥ paścimasyāḥ uttarasyān diśaḥ tṛṇolkāṁ upasaṁhareta na labheta agnir avatāraṁ
K10sf280_sc:2: na labheta ālambanam / .. .. .. yāvaṁ manaso ’pi dharmeṣu māra upasaṁkrāmati avatāraprekṣī
K10sf280_sc:3: avarāragaveṣī na labhate māra avatāraṁ pūrvavat /
K10sf280_sc:4: Wal_2 evaṁ vihārī bhikṣu rūpam abhibhūr bhavati no tu rūpair abhibhūyate / ṣabdāṁ gandhāṁ
K10sf280_sc:5: rasāṁ spraṣṭavyāṁ dharmāṁ abhibhūr bhavati no tu dharmair abhibhūyate / rūpābhibhūḥ
K10sf280_sc:6: śabdābhibhūḥ gandhābhibhūḥ rasābhibhūḥ spraṣṭavyābhibhūḥ dharmābhibhūḥ / abhibhūr
K10sf280_sc:7: anabhibhūr bhavati pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ sāṁkleśikaiḥ paunarbhavikaiḥ sajvarair
K10sf280_sc:9: Wal_3 saṁmukhaṁ me āyuṣmantaḥ bhagavato ’ntikāc chrutaḥ saṁmukham udgṛhītaḥ yo ’yam avasrutānavasruto dharmaparyāyaḥ avasrutānavasrutaṁ vo dharmaparyāyaṁ deśayiṣye iti . .. .. ..
K10sf280_sc:10: Wal_4 atha bhagavāṁ āyusmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya kathāparyavasānaṁ viditvā utthāya niṣīdati
K10sf280_sc:11: paryaṁkam ābhujya ṛjuṁ kāyaṁ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṁ smṛtim upasthāpya nivasya bhagavān
K10sf280_sc:12: āyuṣmantaṁ mahāmaudgalyāyanam āmantrayati / sādhu sādhu maudgalyāyana / sādhu khalu
K10sf280_sc:13: tvaṁ maudgalyāyana bhikṣūṇāṁ avasrutānavasrutaṁ dharmaparyāyaṁ deśayasi / punar api
K10sf280_sc:14: tvam abhīkṣṇam api bhikṣūṇām avasrutānavasrutaṁ dharmaparyāyaṁ deśaya / tad bhaviṣyati
K10sf280_sc:16: Wal_5 tatra bhagavāṁ bhikṣūn āmaṁtrayati / udgṛhīdhvaṁ bhikṣavaḥ avasrutānavasrutaṁ dharmaparyāyaṁ
K10sf280_sc:17: dhārayata grāhayata vācayata avasrutānavasrutaṁ dharmaparyāyam / tat kasmād dhetoḥ /
K10sf280_sc:18: ayaṁ dharmaparyāyaḥ hitopasaṁhitaḥ arthopasaṁhitaḥ śīlopasaṁhitaḥ brahmacaryopsaṁhitaḥ
K10sf280_sc:19: abhijñāyai saṁbodhaye nirvāṇāya saṁvartate yāvac ca satpuruṣeṇa pravrajitena śraddhayā
K10sf280_sc:20: avasrutānavasruto dharmaparyāya udgṛhya paryavāpya tathā tathā dhārayitavyo grāhayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ /
K10sf280_sc:21: Wal_6 atha bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavato ’ntikāt prakrāntāḥ /
